metadata.name: Curse Of The Tower | 11 items and more
metadata.description:
[h1]Content[/h1] [list] [*]11 collectibles [*]4 trinkets [*]2 pocket items [*]20 rooms [/list]
[h1]Future[/h1] We plan to continue supporting this mod in the future with content updates, with the next one being about the same size as the current mod.
[h1]Credits[/h1] [list] [*]Mac Cheese: Art, design [*]Eucalyptus: Coding, design, rooms [*]TheSilentGamer: Art, design [*]Arachne: Design, testing, art [/list]
[h1]Special Thanks[/h1] [list] [*]Stamper: Voicelines [*]Lytebringr, for modding tutorials [*]Eufuu, for modding tutorials [*]Xalum, for a code snippet [*]Oatmealine, for a code snippet [/list]
Item Spoilers: [spoiler][url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KNn-xH7xzmuxcPf15_SG7DXV3KTwSabcZSjEvCYnBpM/edit#gid=0][/url][/spoiler]
